participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

GDSC_01.LongName: Are you basically satisfied with your life?

GDSC_02.LongName: Have you dropped many of your activities and interests?

GDSC_03.LongName: Do you feel that your life is empty?

GDSC_05.LongName: Are you hopeful about the future?

GDSC_06.LongName: Are you bothered by thoughts you can't get out of your head?

GDSC_07.LongName: Are you in good spirits most of the time?

GDSC_08.LongName: Are you afraid that something bad is going to happen to you?

GDSC_9.LongName: Do you feel happy most of the time?

GDSC_11.LongName: Do you often get restless and fidgety?

GDSC_12.LongName: Do you prefer to stay at home, rather than going out and doing new things?

GDSC_13.LongName: Do you frequently worry about the future?

GDSC_14.LongName: Do you feel you have more problems with memory than most?

GDSC_15.LongName: Do you think it is wonderful to be alive now?

GDSC_16.LongName: Do you often feel downhearted and blue?

GDSC_17.LongName: Do you feel pretty worthless the way you are now?

GDSC_18.LongName: Do you worry a lot about the past?

GDSC_19.LongName: Do you find life very exciting?

GDSC_20.LongName: Is it hard for you to get started on new projects?

GDSC_21.LongName: Do you feel full of energy?

GDSC_22.LongName: Do you feel that your situation is hopeless?

GDSC_23.LongName: Do you think that most people are better off than you are?

GDSC_24.LongName: Do you frequently get upset over little things?

GDSC_25.LongName: Do you frequently feel like crying?

GDSC_27.LongName: Do you enjoy getting up in the mornings?

GDSC_28.LongName: Do you prefer to avoid social gatherings?

GDSC_29.LongName: Is it easy for you to make decisions?

GDSC_30.LongName: Is  your mind as clear as it used to be?

GDSC_31.Description: Sum of scores from items 1-30. Items are rated 1-Yes or 0-No. A score of 0-9 is considered normal; 10-19 indicates mild depression, and a score over 20 is suggestive of severe depression.  The maximum number of points that can be scored is 30. | Calculation = [GDSC_01]+[GDSC_02]+[GDSC_03]+[GDSC_04]+[GDSC_05]+[GDSC_06]+[GDSC_07]+[GDSC_08]+[GDSC_9]+[GDSC_10]+[GDSC_11]+[GDSC_12]+[GDSC_13]+[GDSC_14]+[GDSC_15]+[GDSC_16]+[GDSC_17]+[GDSC_18]+[GDSC_19]+[GDSC_20]+[GDSC_21]+[GDSC_22]+[GDSC_23]+[GDSC_24]+[GDSC_25]+[GDSC_26]+[GDSC_27]+[GDSC_28]+[GDSC_29]+[GDSC_30]
